meanings.sent1: Eating citrus fruits is important for staying antiscorbutic.
meanings.sent2: The sailors packed lemons on their ship to ensure they remained antiscorbutic.
meanings.sent3: The pirate captain joked that the secret to his health was his antiscorbutic diet of oranges.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude acted as an antiscorbutic, keeping her friends' spirits high.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow color of the bananas made them a visually appealing antiscorbutic option.

meanings.definition: A substance that prevents or cures scurvy.
meanings.sent1: Limes were commonly carried on ships as an antiscorbutic.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed an antiscorbutic to the patient suffering from scurvy.
meanings.sent3: The chef added the antiscorbutic powder to the soup to keep the crew healthy.
meanings.sent4: The orange extract served as a powerful antiscorbutic against the disease.
meanings.sent5: The herbalist recommended a natural antiscorbutic remedy made from various fruits and vegetables.
